p: Furthermore, this plant is used traditionally for gastrointestinal diseases, respiratory problems, and liver inflammation [ 15]. Ferula assa-foetida L. is usually used for the treatment of cough and pneumonia and gastrointestinal parasites and also as an anticoagulant [ 16, 17]. Nigella sativa seeds are used as a diuretic, liver tonic, and digestive. This plant is also used traditionally for the treatment of diarrhea, dyspnea, headache, influenza, and cough in the Middle East, India, and Pakistan [ 18].
